ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The class is a well thought out and in depth look at an important aspect of archaeological theory. I would highly recommend the course in order to gain the tools needed to better understand archaeological theory.

I would certainly recommend this course to anyone who would like to get an overview of recent debates in archaeology. It would be helpful to come to the course with some knowledge of earlier theoretical developments, but this is not absolutely necessary.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I feel that the course has given me the ability to bettercritique and utilize modern archaeological theory.
I did not have any background in archaeological theory prior to taking this course. Now I have a good overview of recent developments in theory and what future debates might look like.
